write_complaint: Dubbatuu kee yookaan yaada kee asitti barre...
terms_content:
Haala Tajaajila Oromia Transport Agency Bus Booking App

Guyyaa Dhuma: 2024

1. Fudhatama Haala
Oromia Transport Agency bus booking application ("App") galchuu fi fayyadamuu dhaan, haala fi murtii walii galtee kana fudhachuufi walii galtee kana irratti hundaa'uuf qaba.

2. Hayyama Fayyadama
App kana fayyadamuu dhaan, hayyamni yeroo gabaabaaf qofa kennama, kan dhuunfaa, kan hin taane kan daldalaaf.

3. Booking fi Kaffaltii
- Booking hundi kan argamu irratti hundaa'a
- Kaffaltii yeroo bookingitti xumuruu qaba
- Deebii kaffaltii imaammata deebii keenya irratti hojjetama
- Dhorkaa yeroo imala 2 dura gochuu qaba

4. Hojii Fayyadamaa
- Odeeffannoo booking sirrii kennuu
- Mana seenuu yeroo imala 30 dura dhaquu
- ID sirrii fi ragaa booking agarsiisuu
- Dhaabbata transport hunda hordofuu

5. Iddoo Hojii Gabaabaa
Oromia Transport Agency homaa indirect, incidental, special, consequential yookaan punitive homaa irratti hin hirmaatu.

6. Odeeffannoo Qunnamtii
Haala kana irratti gaaffilee qabaachuu kee, nu bira jiraachuu kee support@oromia-transport.et
privacy_content:
Imaammata Dhuunfaa Oromia Transport Agency Bus Booking App

Guyyaa Dhuma: 2024

1. Odeeffannoo Nuti Qabnu
- Odeeffannoo dhuunfaa (maqaa, bilbilaa, email) sababa booking
- Odeeffannoo kaffaltii kan mijataa ta'e partners keenya waliin hojjetama
- Odeeffannoo bakka bu'aa mana seenuu fi yeroo gosa
- Odeeffannoo meeshaa app performance fi security

2. Akka Nuti Odeeffannoo Fayyadamnu
- Booking bus hojjetu fi mirkaneessu
- Odeeffannoo booking fi yaada erguu
- Tajaajila keenya fi app performance fooyyessu
- Security eegu fi dhokata ittisu
- Hojii seera hordofuu

3. Qooda Odeeffannoo
Odeeffannoo dhuunfaa kee hin gurguramu, hin bitamu yookaan gara paartilee sadaffaa hin geeffamu, kan armaan gadii malee:
- Kaffaltii hojjechuuf mijataa kaffaltii processors waliin
- Yeroo seerichi barbaade yookaan mirga keenya eeguuf
- Yeroo yaada kee sirrii ta'e

4. Security Odeeffannoo
Odeeffannoo dhuunfaa kee galuu hin barbaachisu, jijjiiruu, beeksisuu yookaan barbachisuu irraa eeguuf, security mijataa hojjenna.

5. Mirga Kee
Mirgi qabda:
- Odeeffannoo dhuunfaa kee galuu
- Odeeffannoo sirrii ta'e sirreessuu
- Odeeffannoo kee haquu gaafachuu
- Yaada marketing irraa bahuu

6. Nu Waliin Wal Qunnamuu
Gaaffilee dhuunfaa irratti, email kennuu privacy@oromia-transport.et
help_content:
Gargaarsa fi Deeggarsa - Oromia Transport Agency

Booking bus kee irratti gargaarsa barbaadaa? Nuti asitti jirra!

Gargaarsa Booking:
‚Ä¢ Akka ticket barbaadu fi booking gochuu danda'u
‚Ä¢ Karaa kaffaltii fi security
‚Ä¢ Filannoo teessuma fi filannoo
‚Ä¢ Booking jijjiiruu fi dhorkaa

Odeeffannoo Imala:
‚Ä¢ Bakka mana seenuu fi tajaajila
‚Ä¢ Imaammata luggage fi daangaa
‚Ä¢ Hojii check-in fi barbaachisaa
‚Ä¢ Boarding passes fi QR codes

Deeggarsa Teekinikaa:
‚Ä¢ App buusu fi ijaaru
‚Ä¢ Login fi rakkoo account
‚Ä¢ Rakkoo kaffaltii processing
‚Ä¢ App crash fi rakkoo teekinikaa

Nu Waliin Wal Qunnamuu:
üìû Tajaajila Fayyadamaa: +251-XXX-XXXX
üìß Email: support@oromia-transport.et
üåê Website: www.oromia-transport.et

Qunnamtii Emergency:
Imala emergency yookaan haalota emergency kee, hotline emergency 24/7 keenya waliin wal qunnamuu.

Saa'aa Hojii:
Kiyya - Sanbata: 6:00 AM - 10:00 PM
Dilbata: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
about_content:
Waa'ee Oromia Transport Agency

Oromia Transport Agency (OTA) mootummaa transport dhuunfaa naannoo Oromia keessaa kan duraa dha, kan amanamummaa, amanamummaa fi gatiin gabaabaa tajaajila transport bus kennuuf qophaa'e.

Ergama Keenya:
Naannoo Oromia keessatti hawaasa walitti hidhuufi daldala dinagdee deeggaruuf, tajaajila transport amanamummaa, amanamummaa fi amanamummaa kennuu.

Mul'ata Keenya:
Mootummaa transport kan duraa fi kan filatamu Itoophiyaa keessatti ta'uuf, mootummaa transport dhuunfaa irratti fooyya'ina agarsiisuuf.

Tajaajila:
‚Ä¢ Magaala guddoo fi magaala xiqqoo walitti hidhu magaalaa gidduu bus
‚Ä¢ Filannoo express fi regular
‚Ä¢ Online booking fi integration kaffaltii mobile
‚Ä¢ Update schedule real-time fi tracking
‚Ä¢ Tajaajila fayyadamaa fi sisitema dubbatuu

Version App: 1.0.0
¬© 2024 Oromia Transport Agency. Mirgi hundi eegama.

Developed by: Ethiopian Artificial Intelligence Institute (EAII)
